data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding & cocos_file.json automatically
[ci skip]update release note
Avoid of type overflow while list size calculation.
data.body:
If _items container is empty `(length - 1) * _itemsMargin` will be large positive value. 
Using `size_t` causes type overflow and large positive sizes.
Using int will cause negative size values.
Direct check looks like the best way.

data.title: Avoid of type overflow while list size calculation.
data.body:
If _items container is empty `(length - 1) * _itemsMargin` will be large positive value. 
Using `size_t` causes type overflow and large positive sizes.
Using int will cause negative size values.
Direct check looks like the best way.

data.title: fix to problem with updating APK in Google Play keeping old OBB
data.body:
This patch fixes the problem when we are unable to keep OBB from previous version when we are uploading new .apk to Google Play.
It was discussed here:
http://discuss.cocos2d-x.org/t/problem-with-updating-apk-in-google-play-keeping-obb-from-previous-version-because-versioncode-changes/36039

data.title: ActionTimeline not trigger _lastFrameListener
data.body:
[https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/editor-support/cocostudio/ActionTimeline/CCActionTimeline.cpp#L211](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/editor-support/cocostudio/ActionTimeline/CCActionTimeline.cpp#L211)

when

endtoffset = -0.0000
_currentFrame = _endFrame

not trigger _lastFrameListener

fix line:211
bool isLast = endtoffset >= 0 || _currentFrame == _endFrame;
if (isLast && !_loop && _lastFrameListener != nullptr)

data.title: luajit performance issue
data.body: More detail information can refer to [this Chinese forum ticket](http://forum.cocos.com/t/luajit/45347).

data.title: fixed #17685: [android] Audio in game couldn't be mute while a ring or a call is coming
[android] Audio in game couldn't be mute while a ring or a call is coming
data.body:
Reported at http://punchbox.info:3000/issues/26198
- cocos2d-x version: v3.14.1
- devices test on: Only appears on some specific devices like XiaoMi 2S
- developing environments
   - NDK version: r10e
   - Xcode version:
   - VS version:
   - browser type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:

1. cpp-tests/NewAudioEngineTest, play a audio by loop
2. Go to background , make a system `count-down` clock
3. Go to foreground, wait for the clock appear
4. Clock comes but with the background music in game playing

data.title: Possible memory leaks fix --patch from issue #17412
data.body:
Some apparent memory leaks were found on issue #17412.

I'm not quite familiar with the code that's being modified -- I just applied the patches created by @ka7713 and created the pull request since the patches do seem to fix a memory leak. Further review is needed.

data.title: GVR - Camera viewport is not reset
data.body:
[-](url) cocos2d-x version: 3.14.1
- devices test on: Mi 4i
- developing environments
   - NDK version: 
   - Xcode version: using Visual Studio and Android Studio
   - VS version: Version 14.0.25431.01 Update 3

Intro:
We are creating a scene that plays a 360 video that can be viewed 1) like other 360 videos in Facebook or Youtube and 2) using vr. To achieve this, we loaded a .csb file containing a sphere (with material and texture). The texture is replaced by video frames when video is played.

Issue in gvr:
1) Switching from vr to non-vr causes image displayed to be displaced towards the right
[screen capture video](https://youtu.be/K1aASasTq3g)
2) vr mode : Texture set on sphere only shows up on a portion of the sphere
[screen capture video](https://youtu.be/-xWPSRj_2Xs)

data.title: ccui.Button getContentSize has error result after setTitleText() and loadTextureNormal()
[Cocos2d-x 3.14.1] Slow application initialization
data.body:
I noticed a big delay in the application init.
Every time I launch the app the program spend 8-10 seconds before printing:
`platform initialization successful`
Cocos2d-x 3.13.1 seems to work much faster.

- cocos2d-x version: 3.14.1
- devices test on: iPad mini 2
- developing environments
   - Xcode version: 8.3.1

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Create a new project
2. Run the project on the device from Xcode

data.title: [ci skip]do not set attributes in java
data.body: if setting attribures in java code, then engine can not select GLES2/GLES3 dynamically

data.title: fixed #17665: [android] Crash while launching on the devices only support OpenGL ES 2.
data.body:
egl.eglCreateContext may return non-null but EGL10.EGL_NO_CONTEXT value.
It will cause create a EGL env with a EGL_NO_CONTEXT egl context which will cause crash.
